00072       // blocking "ls"
00073       std::set<std::string> ls() {
00074         std::set<std::string> streams;
00075         std::istringstream iss(send_request("LIST"));
00076         std::string     stream_name;
00077         boost::uint32_t stream_number;
00078         bool ok(true);
00079         while (ok) {
00080           if (iss >> stream_name) {
00081             if (iss >> stream_number) {
00082               if (stream_name != "")
00083                 streams.insert(stream_name);
00084             } else ok= false;
00085           } else ok= false;
00086         }
00087         return streams;
00088       }

00090       // blocking "GET" command
00091       //  * names can be a list (separated by white space) of names
00092       //  * a name can also be a perl regular expression
00093       bool connect_to(std::string names) {
00094         std::istringstream iss(send_request(str(boost::format("GET %s") % names)));
00095         std::string f;
00096         if (iss >> f) {
00097           LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("clien_base::connect_to '%s'") % f));
00098           if (f == "OK") {
00099             return true;
00100           } else {
00101             LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("clien_base::connect_to response: '%s' '%s'") % f % names));
00102             return false;
00103           }
00104         } else {
00105           return false;
00106         }
00107       }

00144       void on_tick() {
00145         // send tick to server
00146         boost::asio::async_write(socket_,
00147                                  boost::asio::buffer(&tick_buffer_, sizeof(tick_buffer_)),
00148                                  get_strand().wrap(boost::bind(&client_base::handle_write_tick,
00149                                                                this,
00150                                                                boost::asio::placeholders::error,
00151                                                                boost::asio::placeholders::bytes_transferred,
00152                                                                tick_buffer_)));
00153         timer_.expires_at(timer_.expires_at() + boost::posix_time::seconds(1));
00154         timer_.async_wait(get_strand().wrap(boost::bind(&client_base::on_tick, this)));
00155         tick_buffer_ = (tick_buffer_ != 'z') ? tick_buffer_+1 : 'a';
00156       }
00157       void handle_write_tick(boost::system::error_code ec,
00158                              std::size_t bytes_transferred,
00159                              char tick_value) {
00160         if (ec || bytes_transferred == 0) {
00161           LOG_WARNING(str(boost::format("handle_write_tick aborting: error '%s' bytes_transferred=%d")
00162                           % ec.message()
00163                           % bytes_transferred));
00164           get_io_service().stop();
00165           do_close();
00166         } else
00167           LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("tick '%c' sent") % tick_value));
00168       }

00172         boost::asio::async_read(socket_,

00174                                 get_strand().wrap(boost::bind(&client_base::on_receive,
00175                                                               this,

00179       }

00181       // asyncronuosly receive the data of a data packet
00182       void async_receive_data() {
00183         if (header_.length() >= data_buffer().size())
00184           LOG_ERROR(str(boost::format("header: %s H: %d D: %d") % header_ % header_.length() % data_buffer().size()));
00185         ASSERT_THROW(header_.length() < data_buffer().size());
00186         boost::asio::async_read(socket_,
00187                                 boost::asio::buffer(&data_buffer(), header_.length()),
00188                                 get_strand().wrap(boost::bind(&client_base::on_receive,
00189                                                               this,
00190                                                               received_data,
00191                                                               boost::asio::placeholders::error,
00192                                                               boost::asio::placeholders::bytes_transferred)));
00193       }

00195       // receive callback
00196       void on_receive(received_data_type rdt,
00197                       boost::system::error_code ec,
00198                       std::size_t bytes_transferred) {
00199         if (ec) {
00200           LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("receive error: %s. Aborting") % ec.message()));
00201           stop();
00202           return;
00203         }
00204         switch (rdt) {
00205         case received_header:
00206           async_receive_data();
00207           break;
00208         case received_data:
00209           assert(bytes_transferred == header_.length());
00210           if (header_.id() == broadcaster::directory::id()) {
00211             broadcaster::directory new_directory;
00212             new_directory.update(header_.length(), data_buffer().data());
00213             directory_update(new_directory);
00214             std::swap(new_directory, directory_);
00215           } else {
00216             // dump all wav stream
00217             const std::string str_name(get_directory().stream_name_of(get_header().stream_number()));
00218             if (get_header().id() == "WAV_0000")
00219               dump_wav(get_header().approx_ptime(), str_name, data_buffer().begin(), data_buffer().begin()+header_.length());
00220 
00221             // process data samples in a method overwritten in a derived class
00222             process(data_buffer().begin(), data_buffer().begin()+header_.length());
00223           }
00224           // then receive the next header
00225           async_receive_header();
00226           break;
00227         default:
00228           throw std::runtime_error("client_base::on_receive: invalid received data type");
00229         }
00230       }

00232       // blocking send request, returns the response
00233       std::string send_request(std::string request) {
00234         LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("send_request: '%s'") % request));
00235         request += "\r\n";
00236         boost::asio::streambuf request_streambuf;
00237         std::ostream request_stream(&request_streambuf);
00238         request_stream << request;
00239         boost::asio::write(socket_, request_streambuf);
00240         boost::asio::streambuf response_streambuf;
00241         boost::asio::read_until(socket_, response_streambuf, "\r\n");
00242         // std::istream is(&response_streambuf);
00243         // std::string line;
00244         // std::getline(is, line);
00245         // return line;
00246         std::istream buffer(&response_streambuf);
00247         std::stringstream string_buffer;    
00248         buffer >> string_buffer.rdbuf();
00249         LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("response: '%s'") % string_buffer.str()));
00250         return string_buffer.str();
00251       }

00253       // blocking connect
00254       bool connect_socket(std::string server_name,
00255                           std::string server_port) {
00256         using boost::asio::ip::tcp;
00257         tcp::resolver resolver(get_io_service());
00258         tcp::resolver::query    query(server_name, server_port);
00259         tcp::resolver::iterator endpoint_iterator(resolver.resolve(query));
00260         tcp::resolver::iterator end;
00261         boost::system::error_code error = boost::asio::error::host_not_found;
00262         while (error && endpoint_iterator != end) {
00263           socket_.close();
00264           socket_.connect(*endpoint_iterator++, error);
00265           LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("error(connect)= '%s'") % error));
00266         }
00267         return (!error) || (endpoint_iterator != end);
00268       }
